We conclude that GWH is dishonest un investible and we believe the stock is a terminal zero

In January 2022 the most powerful insiders founder and president Craig Evans CEO Eric Dresselhuys as well as CFO Moftakhar Amir started selling their shares to the market and already netted over 1 7m in private gains
GWH lead engineer was formerly the responsible engineering head for the famously dysfunctional Tesla solar tiles

GWH engineering team has a personal history of grifting from failed projects The two founders worked many years in leading engineering roles for ClearEdge Power Inc a fuel cell company that declared bankruptcy in a sudden announcement
A history of consistent failure when working with marquee potential customers leads us to disbelieve the company s very bold claims about its differentiated technology
GWH has boasted about a blue chip customer base However all these pre agreements were later abandoned without any re contracting or any recognized revenue for over ten years
ESI has apparently not even an office for operations and their headquarters is a local caf
ESI announced a 70m new flagship battery factory for their alleged collaboration with GWH with a groundbreaking ceremony in July 2022 We found evidence that the factory is not being built
We believe GWH took significant efforts to conceal its relationship with ESI before announcing their big agreement which makes us believe that management is trying to deliberately mislead investors
We found that ESI this supposedly massive strategic partner has no discernible activities outside of its work with GWH
Our research uncovers ESI is a de facto subsidiary of GWH masquerading as third party client ESI changed its name in February 2022 and shared a near identical logo with GWH until this change
The ESI partnership is the key revenue generating agreement and the only major announcement GWH had since going public and seems to be the key aspect sell side analysts are concentrating on
This breakthrough finally comes following a complete lack of revenue after over 10 years of GWH operations
On August 11 2022 GWH announced a breakthrough partnership under which GWH will initially supply 70 of its Energy Warehouse systems to an Australian company Energy Storage Industries Asia Pacific ESI

The market for long duration battery storage is highly competitive and technically challenging We argue GWH claims about its technology are overstated and targeted at creating investor hype for laypeople regarding the field of battery engineering

ESS Tech Inc GWH develops and produces utility scale batteries for long duration storage of electricity employing a simple yet revolutionary technology iron salt and water that according to them miraculously solves all the ultra hard problems of battery engineering
Caught Red Handed We Present Evidence that ESS Tech Inc s Biggest Customer is Really an Undisclosed Related Party Without Operations GWH Read our New Critical Report Here

Stay tuned for the publication of our new critical report tomorrow It is a smaller sized company but the fraud is absolutely egregious and needs to be called out We believe this company is a terminal zero
Join us on with where we will answer all questions regarding our new critical research report about NIO
Yes you read that right the Chinese government invested 1bn in 2020 in NIO China and already was paid back 2bn and is owed another 6bn Ask yourself who is getting the short end of the stick
Chinese government entities have redeemed US 2B from NIO and may collect another US 6 7B With NIO cash balance of just US 8 2B We believe shareholders risk being materially diluted in future periods

In an apparent violation of these Users trust Li pledged these shares to UBS to secure a personal loan With NIO stock declining 50 since the pledge we believe shareholders are unknowingly exposed to the risk of a margin call against the Users Trust shares
In January 2019 Bin Li transferred 50M shares to the NIO Users Trust an opaque BVI entity purportedly established to provide NIO Users with more influence over the Company s governance
While he has been hailed as the Elon Musk of China Li s past ventures have seen their stocks collapse and been taken private at a fraction of their peak valuations
NIO Chairman and CEO Bin Li is closely tied to Joy Capital and Erhai Liu parties central to the Luckin Coffee Fraud
Weineng s top two executives currently double as NIO Vice President and Battery Operating Executive Manager
Of course it would take a willing potential accomplice to pull off such a scheme While NIO represents limited control over Weineng we identified notable conflicts of interest between the two parties
For Q4 2021 this number only gets worse and we estimate NIO oversupplied up to another 15 200 batteries The effect of this action on NIO bottom line is enormous

Considering Weineng s recent disclosure of 19 000 battery subscriptions we questioned why Weineng held 40 053 batteries as inventory on September 30 2021 We believe NIO flooded Weineng with up to extra 21 053 batteries worth 1 147M RMB to boost its numbers
Through this arrangement we think NIO has juiced its numbers by pulling forward 7 years of revenue

By transferring the burden of collecting monthly subscriptions to Weineng NIO has accelerated its revenue growth Instead of recognizing revenue over the life of the subscription 7 years Weineng allows NIO to recognize revenue from the batteries they sell immediately
We believe sales to Weineng have inflated NIO revenue and net income by 10 and 95 respectively Specifically we find that at least 60 of its FY2021 earnings beat seems attributable to Weineng

While this rapid growth is impressive on the surface our investigation has found Weineng might be to NIO what Philidor was to Valeant Just as Philidor aided Valeant in habitually making numbers NIO has curiously exceeded estimates since establishing Weineng
Despite being formed by NIO and a consortium of investors in late 2020 this unconsolidated related party has already generated billions in revenue for NIO
Allow us to introduce you to Wuhan Weineng Weineng the convenient difference maker helping NIO exceed lofty growth and profitability estimates on The Street

Today we reveal what we consider an audacious scheme by NYSE listed NIO Reminiscent of the Philidor Valeant relationship NIO is likely using an unconsolidated related party to exaggerate revenue and profitability
We believe NIO Plays Valeant esque Accounting Games to Inflate Revenue and Boost Net Income Margins to Meet Targets Read our new critical report here

Best case scenario in which EMO wins the Aznalc llar mine it must then incur significant toxic financing This will be hugely dilutive to current shareholders Ultimately we see a bad outcome for public shareholders and caution that risks in EMO seem not well understood

We believe EMO will not win the Aznalc llar Appeal regardless of the legal outcome of the other party due to a lack of resources that disqualified them initially which continues to plague the company Management conveniently fails to address this among other key risks
We reveal EMO 's reputation in Spain Local news articles expose a company with no financing no expertise limited track record and a tendency to over pitch and underachieve

EMO 's Spanish lawyer was previously arrested and sentenced for illegal interference Current EMO Management stems from Stan Bharti's web of associates We believe that this is just another Stan Bharti pump and dump game as it has happened countless times in the past

We see a pattern of false claims and wild promises which fail to deliver on substantially every front For example EMO failed to pay a 13k euro deposit for the Sierra Alta mine thereby losing rights to the project Perhaps EMO is not interested in real production

Our Spanish investigator uncovered government emails that outlined that EMO was banned from one Spanish region from submitting offers for mines due to reckless behavior and countless breaches Does this tie their hands for the rest of their Spanish projects

We analyzed all of EMO 's projects and NONE have EVER succeeded Management had delivered on 0 out of 10 projects we believe the Aznalc llar mine will be the same We expose what we see as a bait and switch scheme

Recent developments at IBW Aznalc llar are fueling EMO s recent stock run The company is teasing that they will win the rights to Aznalc llar mine and that IBW s high quality assets will provide investors great returns However we believe that neither will come to fruition
Bharti was previously sued for extracting money from companies that he was involved in and allegedly ripping off other investors
Stan Bharti is in our view an infamous stock promoter involved in many notorious firms including Brazilian Potash Flora Growth LLC that on average declined by over 80 EMO EMO V EMO TSXV EMO CA

Emerita Resources Corp EMO V is a Stan Bharti related mining company whose stock has risen over 2000 over the last year But we believe it is a bait and switch theme and the company will not win the Aznalcollar mine Read our new critical report here
New lows for TSP today after CEO and Chairman announced their departure decided to buy millions of shares shortly after our critical report Let's wait and see how this plays out

In summary we believe PLTK s short termism comes at the expense of lasting shareholder and business value Looming regulatory risks and an aggressive monetization strategy make the business unsustainable We see over 40 downside in the stock in the short to medium term

20 of PLTK shares are pledged by insiders in China to Chinese banks which creates a potential overhang on the stock and adds an additional layer of risk for US shareholders This share pledge is hidden from US investors through a holding structure

PLTK in our opinion is a quintessential example of a pattern we frequently see in today s market environment Chinese insiders bring their companies public in the US when faced with regulatory changes which invalidates their business Chinese education companies etc
Chinese regulators denied PLTK access to its A Share market four times seemingly because it considers PLTK s business partly illegal gambling

Our research indicates that regulatory risk is on the horizon for PLTK The state of Washington already charged PLTK with a 38million fine and we believe many other states are to follow as numerous petitions against PLTK games garner attention
PLTK employs an aggressive roll up strategy This aggressive roll up strategy creates the illusion of growth while masking the underlying decline of PLTK s legacy games

PLTK seems like a low quality business with a huge regulatory risk that we believe will materialize soon The company s focus on online casino games and aggressive monetization is not viewed kindly by regulators and the player base
Just recently PLTK s largest shareholder announced another potential sale of 1 2 billion worth of shares 15 25 of total shares outstanding

Additionally the initial public offering did not raise much proceeds for PLTK but instead allowed former shareholders to unload their shares to the public We dug deeper into the company to determine why insiders seem so desperate to cash out

Our research indicates that the company was recklessly stripped of its cash and loaded with debt just prior to its initial public offering PLTK is basically the only major mobile gaming company with a huge debt balance

We believe Playtika Holding Corp NASDAQ PLTK is a low quality immoral online gaming company that Chinese insiders are selling at an overpriced valuation to US investors while failing to disclose major risks Read our new report here

We are thankful for our incredible team that works hard to bust frauds and our many friends in the industry Short activism is a force for good and most participants are aware of the responsibility we have and act accordingly Best of luck to all but the fraudsters in 2022

Going into 2022 we are thankful for our over 20 000 followers and subscribers We do not tweet a lot and it is good to know that so many people care about in depth critical content We will work hard to bring you the highest quality research reports on big stocks in 2022

In summary we believe SOL is a fraudulent company that drastically overrepresents its project pipeline to access the US capital markets SOL is led by what we believe to be a fraudulent team whose legal difficulties will ultimately also cause problems for SOL shareholders
We believe that the legal difficulties of SOL biggest shareholder will cause significant issues for shareholders at some point in the future SOL

SOL spun off several entities to Li in 2017 these entities are now in substantial legal trouble Judgments in China against Li and related entities amount to over 1 billion RMB These are real judgments that authorities will pursue and collect on
Former chairman Xianshou Li remains SOL biggest shareholder but is officially not engaged in management Our research indicates that Li secretly still exercises substantial control over SOL

We believe SOL has terrible corporate governance as evidenced by a seemingly relative of former Chairman Xianshou Li serving on SOL board of directors while being in her 20s and having very limited experience that could justify such a position

SOL continuously categorizes projects as late stage and close to finalization which our research shows to be either non existent or delayed for years Even the projects that we could identify were for the most part delayed by years and way behind company projections
It seems to us that SOL has fabricated projects to give the appearance of a better development pipeline and future economics SOL

Most of SOL projects are in Europe but our research indicates that most of these projects seemingly do not exist We were able to confirm this in several cases with the local government authorities SOL SOL

New research report about ReneSola Ltd SOL out read it here Our on the ground due diligence filings review and communications with local municipalities in Europe indicate that SOL has been vastly misrepresenting its project development pipeline
We see 60 downside in the short to medium term once investors and regulators wake up to the company s shenanigans

The idea that MP is the only feasible competitor to Chinese producers seems like a complete charade given that its biggest client and significant shareholder is controlled by the Chinese Treasury Department
The operations team in charge seems to be the same that led the company into bankruptcy in its previous iteration

MP core management team lacks natural resources credibility and consists of financial engineers Management is not so confi dent in themselves either as they have sold close to 356M worth of stock since going public

MP has been able to ride the green energy and Electric Vehicle hype by mischaracterizing its business and grouping itself with names like TSLA The chosen valuation comps and metrics are a huge red flag to us

MP mine generates nowhere near the economic essence needed to support the current valuation due to the fact that MP mostly mines less valuable rare earth namely Cerium and Lanthanum It does not participate in the favorable trend in rare earth prices like competitors do
When comparing MP and Molycorp side by side it appears that MP current plan is almost an identical copy of Molycorp s failed Project Phoenix from almost 10 years ago

MP is the second iteration of the same mining venture Molycorp that previously ended in bankruptcy However and his friends were able to bring MP public again at a 300x valuation increase in only three years without significant business improvements we could find

We found that Shenghe a related party that accounts for 99 of MP revenue and a significant shareholder can be traced back to the Chinese central government This has been overlooked so far and could potentially pose a national security concern

MP was able to sell itself to investors touting the fact that MP is the largest rare earth producer in the western world and the only feasible competitor to Chinese producers In reality we believe that this is nothing more than a smoke and mirrors show

MP Materials Corp came public on the NYSE in November 2020 through a SPAC reverse merger backed by SPAC King Chamath Palihapitiya But we believe its another low quality deal that will cost investors dearly Read our new critical report here

We conclude PKK CA is a quintessential China Hustle facing imminent NASDAQ delisting potentially followed by identical CSE action We have shared our findings with both exchanges and PKK CA auditor and consider the stock un investable

We believe the real PKK CA mastermind is Liang Golden Qiu a Chinese conman whose prior company LongKey former PKK client related party was blacklisted in China Qiu remains affiliated with this criminal entity
PKK CA CEO Joseph Johnson is one of the most promotional figures we ve come across Yet in our view he is just the face of a scheme to enrich Chinese insiders

PKK CA scheme runs deeper than fake acquisitions It reported vast revenue growth in its Fintech segment but Chinese subsidiary filings from SAIC expose that PKK CA has never owned Asia Synergy Financial Capital the main operating subsidiary despite claiming to own 51

Even if PKK CA purchased these assets they have nominal value and were grossly overpaid for Both Heartbeat and Jinxiaoer generate almost zero revenue low registered capital and limited to no web traffic history
PKK CA is not new to the shell game In December 2019 they claimed to direct 1 4m towards a 70 stake in loan brokerage platform Jinxiaoer but filings uncover PKK has never owned Jinxiaoer either

While PKK CA touted its 30m September 2021 acquisition of Heartbeat a China insurance company we reveal the entity that received these funds is a potentially undisclosed related party that does not even own Heartbeat

PKK CA evolution is questionable at best The company pivoted from failed wannabe Find My iPhone software to revenue less IT services to a fully impaired e commerce platform before becoming a hub for commercial lending in China
The uplisting has been less than smooth sailing It took just 11 days for the stock to be halted for filing deficiencies and we believe it is destined for delisting
Promotion driven excitement for PKK CA alleged rampant revenue growth has led to a gt 1 000 rise in its stock during 2021 culminating with a NASDAQ uplisting in early September
Peak Fintech Group Inc NASDAQ TNT CSE PKK CA is a Canadian parent to subsidiaries claiming to revolutionize China s financial system but we believe it is a fraud Read our new report here
In case you have problems accessing the website here is the PDF again

We conclude that TSP is nothing but an empty box that was nicely packaged and irresponsibly dumped on US investors We see the stock losing up to 50 within a short to medium timeframe once the hype is over

Despite TSP 's attempt to distance itself from its China origins the regulatory uncertainty revolving around Chinese companies listed abroad puts huge headwind on the company s already uncertain future

In our view the TSP is particularly vague about their technology due to them simply lacking differentiated technology While the company touts its 1 000 meter LIDAR sensors they are really enabled by third party LIDAR providers that are non exclusive to TSP
This relationship is zero risk for Navistar and all the burden lies with TSP While Navistar helps TSP push KPIs it made over 200M from its March 2021 pre IPO investments in TSP alone

TSP presents Navistar as a key customer In reality TSP has to reimburse Navistar 10m for expenses TSP is not making any money from this relationship anytime soon instead they are paying Navistar for the opportunity to use its name

however this revenue could be cancelled anytime by the customer and the 500 deposit is completely refundable The SEC sent a letter to TSP to clarify and they ended up deleting the whole revenue forecast

TSP has managed to fool both sell side analysts and investors on pre order numbers that seem to equate to hundreds and millions of dollar in revenue The 5 700 pre orders Nikola had 7 000 the company touted equate to 420m in potential revenue

TSP founders Mo Chen and Xiaodi Hou have a history of failure that is filled with bankruptcies and suspended business licenses The founders track record is spun by the company as successful but a deeper look makes them seem remarkably ill equipped

Did you know that TSP and NKLA have a lot more in common than it may appear For example Both companies are financed by the same bad actors namely VectoIQ aka Stephen Girsky The existence of this investor was conveniently removed from TSP investor presentations

TSP is the latest hot China based IPO of an ambitious autonomous driving technology company but we believe the company has systematically lied and misrepresented key information Brought to you by the people behind NKLA Read our new report here

WELL CA is not a digital first telehealth business They used their inflated stock price to pivot to CRH a completely non digital business that trades off EBITDA with no chance of ever being digital We see 60 downside under optimistic assumptions
WELL CA employs a range of accounting maneuvers that masks true EBITDA profitability Read the details in our report

WELL CA appears to have overpaid for Source 44 Q4 2020 results indicate it may have vastly overstated future performance We unearth signs of a dormant business and terrible infrastructure all signs of a sub par company
WELL CA conveniently outbid itself for Insig by paying a 200 premium to the implied valuation of WELL CA initial investment just half a year earlier as lead investor
WELL CA purchased a proclaimed telehealth company Circle Medical However we believe this is far from reality that's why Circle s shareholders cashed out with the WELL CA deal
WELL CA paid a 300 premium for Adracare a company emerging from bankruptcy with a history of cooked financials
It appears WELL CA has omitted crucial information on many recent acquisitions including CRH Acquisitions are marketed as synergistic and financially solid but evidence uncovered suggests otherwise

We believe WELL CA largest ever acquisition CRH Medical is highly problematic reflecting that WELL CA hype train is over Red flags indicate a high likelihood of conflict of interest and due diligence failures CRH appears to be a toxic deal that WELL grossly overpaid for

It s CEO neglects to discuss a crucial aspect of his famed divestiture to a Silicon Valley buyer omitting that a year post close the asset was shut down likely due to material data breaches at the company an ominous sign for WELL CA disclosures

WELL CA stock has increased 500 in 10 months on the back of multiple digital first acquisitions Management are enjoying the ride but we re concerned retail will be holding the bag as digital progress is overstated and acquisitions have been at best overpaid for

Last thoughts The answer to the GSX issue is not a margin call Also don t believe everything you read in the news even if it comes from people familiar with the matter We suspect there is a lot more to the GSX manipulation than we currently know

GSX really exemplifies the worst in today s market Rampant market manipulation crazy leverage obviously fraudulent financials and regulators failing to act Of course our investment banks are key enablers
Reason 7 The key reason why we believe cannot sign GSX annual audit is that the consequences will be brutal has a substantial China business and should not risk it over a single fraudulent company

Reason 6 GSX is the most exposed fraud case in history Whistleblower lawsuits confirm the worst allegations short sellers have made over the last year How long can Enforcement blatantly ignore the mountain of evidence

Reason 5 We pointed out in our very first publication in February 2020 that we believe GSX land acquisition involved CAPEX fraud and that GSX overreported the purchase price of the land meaningfully has insight into the original documents underlying the transaction

Reason 4 The recent market manipulation allegations surrounding bad actors in GSX are staggering This makes the mysterious private placement in December 2020 even more troublesome The placement was done without a broker and without revealing the identity of the buyers

Reason 3 We believe the long term investment balance of GSX is simply falsified Do we really want to find out that all it would have taken to reveal the fraud is a call by the auditor to the banks supposedly holding these giant investment accounts Wirecard all over again

Reason 2 Most of GSX teachers are fake in our opinion can simply cross check teacher identities with their teacher certification number and the employment contract with GSX We doubt that most of the teachers exist See also

Reason 1 Abruptly exploding expenses After a rosy outlook on the 2Q 2020 call marketing expenses suddenly exploded We believe there are no underlying bank wires for most of the expenses and those that do exist are with captive marketing companies that circle back cash
7 Reasons Why CANNOT Sign GSX Annual Audit And our thoughts on the recent trading spectacle Read our new follow up report here

ALPP second drone company acquisition Vayu appears no better than Impossible as it seems to be merely a shell that was formerly a nonprofit Vayu sports limited full time employees has had no real progress in years and is in our opinion not economically viable

ALPP acquired its first drone company called Impossible in end 2020 We visited Impossible facilities and found them empty our pictures are truly worth 1000 words the business is virtually non existent with no verifiable tangible assets

ALPP management are in our opinion highly questionable We believe its CEO is a serial stock promoter that has often misled shareholders ALPP Sales VP was charged with health care fraud and at one time faced up to ten years in prison

ALPP recent claim to fame circles around the prospect of fl ying high alongside the hyped drone industry ALPP stock has skyrocketed on glorious claims combined with a record setting press release machine plus promotional activity on social media

The main product La Croix is in our opinion overprized and a fad Competitors with deeper pockets PEP amp KO are gaining market share Newly introduced brands and products have performed sub par FIZZ does not deserve a premium valuation of a growth company
The core business is under pressure sales have flatlined and increasing competition will translate to FIZZ declining profits
The company has a history of alleged financial manipulation and our research substantiates the suspicion

The integrity issues at the company show on many fronts like misleading marketing alleged dealings with undisclosed related parties and undisclosed insider enrichment Most shocking to us are sexual harassment allegations against FIZZ 82 year old Chairman

The problems at FIZZ start with horrifi c corporate governance Chairman and CEO Nick Caporella has been on the board for 36 years his son Joseph for 34 No one new has joined the board in 11 years and no one is under 60
We heard rumors that brokers are circulating positive notes about FIZZ to hedge funds We believe a lot of the recent buyers do not really understand what they own
The recent frenzy in high short interest stocks most notably GME and AMC has lifted several other stocks and created an attractive short opportunity in FIZZ

CCTV Commentator in the program warns of the regulatory risks platforms such as DOYU are facing if this issue does not get resolved

Wu also states that over 80 are students Tens of thousands participate in the game but only one would win Some students also go to online lending companies to borrow money or use their living expense and tuition money to participate in online lotteries
For example DOYU platform would approve the names of streaming rooms that have keywords such as cash reward an obvious hint of gambling

Whistleblower Wu stated that DOYU platform not only knows about the online lottery activities but also supported it She states that the reason why DOYU has such a wide spread online gambling problem is precisely due to DOYU indulgence and promotion of such events
There are many more live streaming rooms that are engaged in suspected online gambling for example etc
The reporter connected with one of the live streaming room hosts on WeChat reporter received information and was told that he can participate in the lottery anytime
Since June last year a lot of the streamers have moved their operations underground via QQ Groups and WeChat due to regulatory pressure However online gambling is still widely prevalent

Here are the highlights of the CCTV report The No 1 Streamer on DOYU Changsha Xiangcun Gansidui is suspected to be operating online gambling One user in the live streaming room lost 200 000 RMB in little over 10 minutes This room s annual GMV was 177 18 million RMB in 2020

Today CCTV exposed DOYU for the Online gambling activities A risk that we outlined in our recent report Reporters and whistleblower stated that DOYU not only knew about this but willingly guided and taught streamers to conduct such activities while bypassing regulations
The hashtag DOYU streaming room becomes teenager s gambling place created by on Weibo now has over 3 2 million views and it s trending China is taking notice so should US investors

According to third party data the live streaming room Changsha Xiangcun Gansidui has GMV of 177M RMB Just yesterday it was reported that DOYU's second most prominent streamer 339 who has GMV 110M RMB was arrested by the police

Regulators in the US and abroad need to step up and punish crimes otherwise you create a perverse incentive environment where it almost feels like a management s fiduciary duty to commit crimes as long as it pays for shareholders
We modeled out Q4 guidance based on streamer performance data and project a decrease on both a YoY and QoQ basis We believe further deterioration is soon to follow and the impact will be long lasting

We believe that even AMZN stock would have gotten hit if second most prominent streamer had been arrested by the police The market seems to not have fully realized today s revelations about DOYU and the implication
Just today Chinese media reported that DOYU s second most prominent streamer has been arrested by the police due to suspected online gambling The problems seem to be massive on DOYU s platform

Recently HUYA and DOYU announced their business combination However we believe HUYA is not without problems either Regardless of whether the deal goes through or not we believe both companies would be trading at much lower valuations Report
We identified additional evidence of order brushing and suspected pornography on DOYU both of which are subject to more stringent regulatory control in China
DOYU opted to not give revenues guidance for Q4 for the first time since it went public likely due to the dim quarter following the crackdown of many DOYU streamers due to illegal online gambling
MOMO another online streaming platform based in China recently presented terrible financial performance in light of structural reform We believe this is an indicator of what is to come to DOYU

Recent policy announcements indicate a more stringent regulatory environment that is cracking down on online gambling order brushing and faking operating numbers We believe the full scale of the policy reform will be massive

We see a clear pattern of pump and dump riding on trends We believe the stock will soon return to previous levels In fact we believe SPI is uninvestable and should be immediately delisted Enforcement News
We identified that unbeknownst to investors the CEO of SPI is a wanted fugitive in China He has also been involved in another public company that went bankrupt prior to joining SPI
SPI called this Chinese partner a leading manufacturer of all electric logistic vehicles in China When does exaggeration become fraudulent Report Research
We found out that the key Chinese EV partner doesn t have any current operations and all business was halted over a year ago Site visits and calls with distributors confirmed our suspicions
Recently in September 2020 SPI stock ran high after it launched a company called EdisonFuture Inc focusing on the design and development of electric vehicles EV and EV charging solutions

We believe SPI is an egregious pump and dump company The company s stock has had a date with almost all the hottest trends in the recent two years including Cryptocurrency CBD and now Electric Vehicles

The recent rise in attention will bring additional regulatory scrutiny to the brand an under represented risk MNST already sued CELH
Particularly concerning we believe Carl DeSantis is really the mastermind behind CELH But just look at what happened with Rexall Sundown The similarities to CELH are striking in our opinion
We visited Func Food headquarter and did dozens of store checks in Sweden Our conclusion CELH is not what it portrays itself to be
Shout out to who talked about CELH in his newsletter Go check him out presents some good bullish thoughts on CELH Give both a follow it s worth it
It is not surprising these concerns have not been addressed as CELH auditor Assurance Dimensions has a far from stellar track record and in our view seems ill equipped to spot misrepresentations

Combine this with the apparent fraudulent track record of key individuals and an auditor who seems ill equipped to detect fraud and you have yourself a perfect set up for a bad awakening We see CELH declining to a price target of 9 99 and potentially much lower
Given the risks noted in this report we believe investors should exercise caution when thinking about the growth that judging by market valuation is assumed to be a foregone conclusion CELH

Current CELH shareholders are selling large portions of shares Investors who participated in the 2020 Private Placement immediately offered an on shelf prospectus to dump their shares We see a lack of confidence in their own stock
CELH has also rightfully come under scrutiny for misleading advertising We believe the company carefully walks the line with the health benefit claims backed by their own scientific studies Report
An executive member of CELH initial Nordic Distributor People s Choice acquired by Func Foods is linked to the Panama Papers

There are key individuals with worrying backgrounds that seem largely unknown to investors We believe CELH key shareholder Carl DeSantis has a checkered history of what appears to be fraudulent behavior

Several employees run businesses that are not disclosed by LX as related parties We identified these businesses as service providers or in the same field as LX The opportunity to maneuver costs and siphon off money unbeknownst to investors and auditors is troublesome to us
The Corona Virus pandemic added insult to injury and the consequent shut down of the economy has put a massive number of consumers and consumer loans in default or delinquency

LX seems to be still actively engaged in direct peer to peer lending which the company supposedly already halted per regulatory pressure Other companies that have broken p2p restrictions have mostly been shut down and executives were even jailed

LX has historically charged Chinese consumers enormous interest rates often above the legal 36 usury rate New regulation in China will significantly limit how much LX can charge to 15 4 therefore putting the entire business model at risk

LX reports unfathomably low delinquency rates that we simply do not trust We believe LX is reporting artificially low delinquency rates by essentially giving borrowers who are already in default new funds to make payments This has led to a rapidly deteriorating credit quality

The structure utilized by LX exposes its shareholders to enormous losses by guaranteeing payment of loans while putting Chinese lenders This strikes us as a quintessential Heads I win tails you lose situation for current shareholders
LX operates a high interest rate online consumer lending platform in China We believe LX business model is deeply flawed and set to collapse Our target price is ZERO

GSX previous CFO resigned from the company just prior to the IPO in a rush Current CFO Nan Shen was identified to be related to Sinoedu a Chinese online education company with numerous fraud allegations against it We see this as huge red flags

The founder of GSX Larry Chen is the largest shareholder of two private Chinese companies dealing in financials that were flagged by the local financial oversight bureau as operating without required licenses This could bring about legal troubles for Chen and even GSX

We are deeply concerned about GSX management GSX original founders and previous shareholders have largely cashed out and are leaving rapidly We do not see this behavior as invoking confidence in the future of the company

By reviewing third party rankings on online education companies in China we again identified huge discrepancies betweem GSX fame in the stock market and its reputation in the online education industry Peers such as TAL and EDU platforms were much more consistent

According to third party web traffic data GSX market penetration stock performance and its web traffic are severely mismatched Even under the current coronavirus which is thought to greatly benefit online education GSX and Gaotu s traffic were still insignificant

We found a report that describes how GSX excessively uses order brushing firms and fake accounts to artificially create student enrollments and revenues We have found numerous additional data points that suggest this situation still persists if not worsened

We are concerned about GSX acquisition of commercial real estate and suspect CAPEX fraud Chinese filings SAIC show that only RMB75m went into the construction of the real estate GSX purchased for over RMB330m Either GSX is overpaying drastically or lying to investors

We have strong reasons to believe GSX has been hiding expenses and losses from its financials through unconsolidated related third parties These third parties seem to act as alter egos of GSX as evidenced by work location job postings and employee resumes
According to credit reports obtained from Chinese authorities GSX has been drastically inflating profitability Net income in 2018 has been overstated by 74 6 compared to SEC financials

Hempton Triumphs Our fundamental analysis of WUBA shows that the company s core business is facing numerous headwinds including an unfavorable environment for housing and job market These issues are only emphasized by the recent health crisis in China

Hempton Triumphs WUBA spun off its peer to peer car sales platform and its finance businesses to insiders in arcane transactions that seemed to be aimed at insider enrichment at the cost of public shareholders

Hempton Triumphs Our accounting analysis of WUBA SEC filings shows that the company employs what we believe to be many accounting shenanigans that seem to be aimed at dressing up SEC financials WUBA seems to try to avoid consolidating entities whose financials do not look favorable

Hempton Triumphs We also see a pattern where the best businesses are spun off at deflated prices to insiders and less successful business segments are kept in the public company and dressed up to make the financials appear better

Hempton SAIC filings suggest that WUBA has been inflating the financials it reports to the SEC Revenues in the last three years for the overall company are overstated by a cumulative RMB 4 6 billion Triumphs

Hempton Assets related to Ganji currently make up 2 1bn or over 50 of WUBA shareholder equity and we believe should be impaired in light of our findings We call on the company s auditor PWC Zhongtian and regulators to look into the questions and issues we outline in our report

We believe that WUBA has failed to disclose that its biggest acquisition Ganji acquired for 2 8bn has seen its revenue plummet by over 95 since the acquisition by WUBA Ganji is still touted as core asset Hempton
Our extensive due diligence accounting analysis and review of Chinese SAIC filings suggests to us that Inc WUBA is a house of cards with little economic substance Our latest research report
